header_text: You are on a long drive with a friend. You notice that neither of you has said anything for a few minutes. Focused on the road, you think your friend feels that the silence is completely normal.

elements.Text: Does your friend think you are awkward when there is silence during the drive?

elements.name: You are on a long drive with a friend. You notice that neither of you has said anything for a few minutes. Focused on the road, you think your friend feels that the silence is completely normal._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
